title: Requires that school anti-harassment policies are enforced in compliance with the regulations of the chancellor of the New York city department of education
summary: Requires that school anti-harassment policies are enforced in compliance with the regulations of the chancellor of the New York city department of education.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that school anti-harassment policies are enforced in compliance with the regulations of the chancellor of the New York city department of education
